pkgmetadata.longdescription: Test of accuracy of formatting numbers. // Functions scientific.mpfr() and get.format.from.sci() allow to compute format information for numbers with high accuracy using Rmpfr package. Function check.format() compares this to the output of R base function format.info(). On platforms with a proper "long double" type, the error should not exceed 1 ulp of the input number.
